title: Why was all the money spent to install a DOT Weight zone on US421 in front of the police firing range.  The camera has been up for months and it seems no one monitors it or even uses it.  Seems our tax payer money could be spent better than that, like pave 3rd St.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Thanks for using MyReporter.com!  http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9915
